description: My place is close to brooklyn childrens museum, long island railroad, prospect park, barclays stadium, Nostrand Avenue Pub, Sit & Wonder. You’ll love my place because of It is in the heart of historic and landmarked crown heights. It is close to all the city and its amenities. It is close to all public transportation and local airports JFK and Laguardia..
name: Private Studio  2F
review: Very accommodating and gracious host.   Made us feel right at home.  Couldn't ask for a better experience.  Everything was as described.   We have no complaints.   We will be back to stay with Derek next year.
